Smart Ice Tray: A smart ice tray that can monitor the temperature and humidity levels in your freezer and adjust the shape of the ice cubes accordingly. It can also track the amount of ice cubes used and alert you when it's time to restock. Confidence score: 0.8

Gourmet Ice Tray: A high-end ice tray that allows you to create unique and flavorful ice cubes. It comes with different molds for different flavors, such as lemon, mint, and basil. The ice cubes can be easily removed and used in drinks or as a garnish. Confidence score: 0.9

Portion Control Ice Tray: An ice tray that helps you control your portion sizes by dividing each cube into equal portions. This can be helpful for people who want to manage their calorie intake or who are trying to eat healthier. Confidence score: 0.7

Insulated Ice Tray: An ice tray with built-in insulation that keeps the ice cubes colder for longer. This can be especially useful for people who like to have cold drinks on hand throughout the day. Confidence score: 0.8

Smart Ice Tray with Built-in Water Filter: An ice tray that comes with a built-in water filter, allowing you to make ice cubes from filtered water. This can be especially useful for people who want to reduce their exposure to impurities in their drinking water. Confidence score: 0.9
